name: Tupac
desc: A giant from the People of the Springs and one of the six heroes of Natlan with the Ancient Name He died during the Cataclysm 500 years ago.

videoCollection.title: Cutscene Animation: "Before Dawn Breaks" | Genshin Impact

imgDesc.text: The heir of Tupac's Ancient Name, Mualani, and Tupac.

customize.name: People of the Springs
customize.desc: One of the six tribes of Natlan, also known as Meztli. They are cheerful, kind people, lovers of music, gatherings, and hot springs. The tribe lives alongside the Koholasaurs.

customize.text: Tupac grew up in the People of the Springs.

customize.name: Tenoch
customize.desc: A hero of Natlan, who lived 500 years ago. He didn't belong to any tribe, because he was exiled. During the Cataclysm, he united the six tribes and went to the western islands to fight a giant black monster.

customize.text: Tenoch was Tupac's greatest foe of youth. The giant left him 200 minor wounds, 2 broken ribs, and one eye that will never again perceive distance. When Tenoch became the leader of the tribal coalition forces during the

customize.name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
customize.desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.

customize.text: , Tupac was the last to join him.

customize.name: Haborym
customize.desc: The name Haborym is supposedly borne by all mortal Archons of Natlan. The current Archon is Mavuika.

customize.text: Tupac agreed with the Pyro Archon's plan and fought alongside her against the Abyss. He was the one who carried Mavuika to the Sacred Flame so she could enter it and be reborn in 500 years.

customize.name: Mualani
customize.desc: A well-known guide in Natlan who owns a watersports shop, and expert in all forms of wave-chasing.

customize.text: One of the six heroes of Natlan who participated in Haborym's plan and the heir of the Ancient Name Umoja.

customize.name: Talking Stick
customize.desc: Most people will find this obsidian-inlaid club quite convincing indeed.

customize.name: Ash-Graven Drinking Horn
customize.desc: A ritual vessel passed down amongst the Meztli. They say that this was once a treasure much-valued, yet never used, by the hero "Giant" Tupac.

customize.name: Waveriding Whirl
customize.desc: A boomerang made from the fangs of a giant sea serpent. It was a rare weapon indeed that the giant Tupac would call "trusty."
